trans-unit.source: MOF Compiler Properties for Driver Projects
trans-unit.target: MOF Compiler Properties for Driver Projects

trans-unit.source: The Managed Object Format (MOF) compiler (mofcomp.exe) parses MOF files and adds the classes and class instances defined in the files to the WMI repository.
trans-unit.target: The Managed Object Format (MOF) compiler (mofcomp.exe) parses MOF files and adds the classes and class instances defined in the files to the WMI repository.

trans-unit.source: Use the Mofcomp property page to compile MOF files with your driver.
trans-unit.target: Use the Mofcomp property page to compile MOF files with your driver.

trans-unit.source: For more information about Mofcomp.exe and WMI, see [**mofcomp**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Aa392389), [Compiling MOF Files](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Aa389240), and [Compiling a Driver's MOF File](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Ff542012).
trans-unit.target: For more information about Mofcomp.exe and WMI, see [**mofcomp**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Aa392389), [Compiling MOF Files](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Aa389240), and [Compiling a Driver's MOF File](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Ff542012).

trans-unit.source: Setting Managed Object Format (MOF) Compiler properties for driver projects
trans-unit.target: Setting Managed Object Format (MOF) Compiler properties for driver projects

trans-unit.source: Open the property pages for your driver project.
trans-unit.target: Open the property pages for your driver project.

trans-unit.source: Right-click the driver project in **Solution Explorer** and select **Properties**.
trans-unit.target: Right-click the driver project in **Solution Explorer** and select **Properties**.

trans-unit.source: In the property pages for the driver project, click **Configuration Properties** and then click **Mof Compiler**.
trans-unit.target: In the property pages for the driver project, click **Configuration Properties** and then click **Mof Compiler**.

trans-unit.source: Set the properties for the project.
trans-unit.target: Set the properties for the project.

trans-unit.source: This property page is available if you add a Managed Object Format (MOF) file (.mof) to your solution.
trans-unit.target: This property page is available if you add a Managed Object Format (MOF) file (.mof) to your solution.

trans-unit.source: Option
trans-unit.target: Option

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Additional Options
trans-unit.target: Additional Options

trans-unit.source: Specifies additional options to pass to the mofcomp tool.
trans-unit.target: Specifies additional options to pass to the mofcomp tool.

trans-unit.source: Amendement
trans-unit.target: Amendement

trans-unit.source: Splits the MOF file into language-neutral and -specific versions.
trans-unit.target: Splits the MOF file into language-neutral and -specific versions.

trans-unit.source: (-AMENDMENT:Locale)
trans-unit.target: (-AMENDMENT:Locale)

trans-unit.source: Authority
trans-unit.target: Authority

trans-unit.source: Specifies Authority as the authority (domain name) to use when logging on to WMI.
trans-unit.target: Specifies Authority as the authority (domain name) to use when logging on to WMI.

trans-unit.source: (-A:Authority)
trans-unit.target: (-A:Authority)

trans-unit.source: Auto Recover
trans-unit.target: Auto Recover

trans-unit.source: Adds the named MOF file to the list of files compiled during repository recovery.
trans-unit.target: Adds the named MOF file to the list of files compiled during repository recovery.

trans-unit.source: (-autorecover)
trans-unit.target: (-autorecover)

trans-unit.source: Create Binary Mof File
trans-unit.target: Create Binary Mof File

trans-unit.source: Requests that the compiler create a binary version of the MOF file with the name filename without making any modifications to the WMI repository.
trans-unit.target: Requests that the compiler create a binary version of the MOF file with the name filename without making any modifications to the WMI repository.

trans-unit.source: (-B:Filename)
trans-unit.target: (-B:Filename)

trans-unit.source: Language Neutral Output
trans-unit.target: Language Neutral Output

trans-unit.source: Name of the language neutral output.
trans-unit.target: Name of the language neutral output.

trans-unit.source: (-MOF:Path)
trans-unit.target: (-MOF:Path)

trans-unit.source: Language Specific Output
trans-unit.target: Language Specific Output

trans-unit.source: Name of the language specific output.
trans-unit.target: Name of the language specific output.

trans-unit.source: (-MFL:Path)
trans-unit.target: (-MFL:Path)

trans-unit.source: Mof Class
trans-unit.target: Mof Class

trans-unit.source: Creates or updates MOF classes.
trans-unit.target: Creates or updates MOF classes.

trans-unit.source: Create Only (-class:createonly) Requests that the compiler not make any changes to existing classes.
trans-unit.target: Create Only (-class:createonly) Requests that the compiler not make any changes to existing classes.

trans-unit.source: When this switch is used, the compile operation terminates if a class specified in the MOF file already exists.
trans-unit.target: When this switch is used, the compile operation terminates if a class specified in the MOF file already exists.

trans-unit.source: Force Update (class:forceupdate) Forces updates of classes when conflicting child classes exist.
trans-unit.target: Force Update (class:forceupdate) Forces updates of classes when conflicting child classes exist.

trans-unit.source: Safe Update (-class:safeupdate) Allows updates of classes even if there are child classes, as long as the change does not cause conflicts with child classes.
trans-unit.target: Safe Update (-class:safeupdate) Allows updates of classes even if there are child classes, as long as the change does not cause conflicts with child classes.

trans-unit.source: Update Only (-class:updateonly) Requests that the compiler not create any new classes.
trans-unit.target: Update Only (-class:updateonly) Requests that the compiler not create any new classes.

trans-unit.source: See mofcomp for more information.
trans-unit.target: See mofcomp for more information.

trans-unit.source: NamespacePath
trans-unit.target: NamespacePath

trans-unit.source: Requests that the compiler load the MOF file into the namespace specified as namespacepath.
trans-unit.target: Requests that the compiler load the MOF file into the namespace specified as namespacepath.

trans-unit.source: (-N:namespacepath)
trans-unit.target: (-N:namespacepath)

trans-unit.source: Resource Locale
trans-unit.target: Resource Locale

trans-unit.source: Extracts the localized MOF descriptions from the binary MOF when used with -ER switch.
trans-unit.target: Extracts the localized MOF descriptions from the binary MOF when used with -ER switch.

trans-unit.source: (-L:ResourceLocale)
trans-unit.target: (-L:ResourceLocale)

trans-unit.source: Resource Name
trans-unit.target: Resource Name

trans-unit.source: Extracts binary MOF from a named resource.
trans-unit.target: Extracts binary MOF from a named resource.

trans-unit.source: (-ER:ResourceName)
trans-unit.target: (-ER:ResourceName)

trans-unit.source: Syntax Check
trans-unit.target: Syntax Check

trans-unit.source: Requests that the compiler perform a syntax check only and print appropriate error messages.
trans-unit.target: Requests that the compiler perform a syntax check only and print appropriate error messages.

trans-unit.source: No other option can be used with the Syntax Check option.
trans-unit.target: No other option can be used with the Syntax Check option.

trans-unit.source: WMI Syntax Check
trans-unit.target: WMI Syntax Check

trans-unit.source: Requests that the compiler perform a WMI syntax check -WMI .
trans-unit.target: Requests that the compiler perform a WMI syntax check -WMI .

trans-unit.source: If you select this option, you must also select the Create Binary Mof File option (-B:Filename)
trans-unit.target: If you select this option, you must also select the Create Binary Mof File option (-B:Filename)

trans-unit.source: Related topics
trans-unit.target: Related topics

trans-unit.source: Compiling MOF Files
trans-unit.target: Compiling MOF Files

trans-unit.source: Compiling a Driver's MOF File
trans-unit.target: Compiling a Driver's MOF File

trans-unit.source: mofcomp
trans-unit.target: mofcomp
